name: Carnival.exe
description:
This is a fanmade and not a real nickelodeon game. duh

Story:

Bikini Bottom has been victim of a cyber-attack of unknown origin. Now, all the machines have started to attack the citizens. Meanwhile, Mr. Krabs has bought the fair for the carnival that will be held in the next 6 days. And he gave Spongebob the task of testing the games. Simple task, isn't it?

This game is based on that old flash game called Bikini Bottom Carnival. And the episode "Karen Virus"
